attributes.action: ban Robert Mugabe from attending the annual memorial service at the Cenataph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can we accept this man into our country as a bona fida representative of Zimbabwe, albeit a Commonwealth country, whilst he continues to condemn ex colonial rulers and abuse his own people for his own greed.  

His presence would be an insult to the memory of those being remembered who fought and died for him to live in a free world.
